channel.title: Free 2007 Servers! - ProjectDestiny07
channel.description:
[url=http://ProjectDestiny07.com/][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xWKCKMZ.png[/img][/url]
Project Destiny 474 is a 2007 remake of the revision #474. We are currently in BETA. (Accounts will [b]not[/b] be reset after BETA.) There are huge plans for this server. You are looking at what will be one of the best RuneScape rewrites that you've ever seen. We plan on making this server a hell of a lot of fun, and if you come and join us you can get an early start on what will be one of the best. The exp rate multiplier is currently set at 5x and is dropping from there as we get more players.
Currently, we have three developers. Steve, 123sk8, and Saifix. 123sk8 is in charge of writing scripts (plugins) for the server, doing configuration, and some minor programming. Steve is programming the more difficult tasks such as minigames, skills, some quests, etc. Saifix is mostly working on web and server development. I can promise that this server will excel in the near future, and the more that join, the better it will become.
[B]Join Project Destiny today, and get a head start![/B]
[SIZE=3][COLOR=teal]Website: [/COLOR][url=http://ProjectDestiny07.com/]Main Website[/url][/SIZE] [SIZE=3][COLOR=teal]Webclient: [/COLOR][url=http://www.projectdestiny07.com/webclient/webclient.html]Project Destiny Webclient[/url][/SIZE] [SIZE=3][COLOR=teal]Download Client: [/COLOR][url=http://projectdestiny07.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?fid=22]Project Destiny Client[/url][/SIZE]
[B][U]Features[/U][/B]
[ul]•Perfectly working combat. •20 working skills. •10 working quests. •Perfect Clan Chat System •Highscores •Webclient. •100% uptime! •Music and sounds working. •A stable economy. •4 working minigames. (Barrows, Duel Arena, Fight Pits, and Mage Arena.)
[SIZE=5][COLOR=black][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IVQeZYY.png[/img]Quests[/COLOR][/SIZE]
•[COLOR=green]Rune Mysteries[/COLOR] •[COLOR=green]Lost City[/COLOR] •[COLOR=green]Priest in Peril[/COLOR] •[COLOR=green]Tree Gnome Village[/COLOR] •[COLOR=green]Cook's Assistant[/COLOR] •[COLOR=green]Doric's Quest[/COLOR] •[COLOR=green]Witch's Potion[/COLOR] •[COLOR=green]Sheep Shearer[/COLOR] •[COLOR=green]Restless Ghost[/COLOR] •[COLOR=green]Imp Catcher[/COLOR]
[B][U]Screenshots[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gSuQHF2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dSX2VfP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VVAN2T2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DjL2CIA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/afaeyHW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iwmp5pX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WPPaQpj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QH8i0Mt.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3iOtK/0a0fa47873.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/izoNGum.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xO3Abk5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CufRITg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MwMj20B.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vIiDCOV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yjrpUM2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eoYQrs3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HRNt2cH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/e7u3KLC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CFgRZal.png[/img][/ul]

item.title: Free 2007 Servers! - ProjectDestiny07
item.dc:creator: @112233sk8 112233sk8
item.description:
@112233sk8 wrote:

Steve and I are the developers of the server. ProjectDestiny07 is one of our very helpful mods.

With that being said, this server was put into development may 5th, 2012.
We started with a base called rs2-474 which basically only had combat and a couple skills, not the edited ones that have been released
not too long ago.

The latest rs2-474 edit was actually a very early version of our server that a old developer leaked.

This is the most advanced 474 remake you will ever play. Also probably the most advanced remake online to my knowledge.

The low exp rate is because we don’t want everyone running around with skillcapes on a remake
it doesn’t seem realistic and also isn’t attractive to see in a remake.

Read full topic

item.title: Free 2007 Servers! - ProjectDestiny07
item.dc:creator: @ProjectDestiny07 ProjectDestiny07
item.description:
@ProjectDestiny07 wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:30, topic:522175”]I played for a while the other day. The community is very helpful and welcoming. I’m going to jump on the bandwagon here and say that I also feel the experience rate is a bit slow.
Good luck. :)[/quote]
Yep, I agree the community is quite nice. I suppose having a lower experience rate is a bit of niche marketing.
Thanks!

Read full topic
